ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

This repository provides an open-source, AI-powered video editing platform that offers advanced multi-track editing, real-time previews, and fast exports. It aims to be a user-friendly alternative to popular tools like Capcut and Canva, with features like an AI assistant for automated edits and a smart media library.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

PyTgCalls is an asynchronous Python library that enables developers to integrate Telegram group voice call functionalities into their applications. It leverages MTProto and WebRTC, working with popular MTProto libraries like Pyrogram and Telethon to facilitate voice and video calls in channels and chats.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

LLM Council is a local web application that leverages multiple large language models (LLMs) to answer complex questions. It sends queries to various LLMs, has them review and rank each other's responses, and then synthesizes a final answer using a designated 'Chairman' LLM.

Arch-Cleaner is a bash script designed for Arch Linux users to automate routine system maintenance and cleanup tasks. It offers configurable options for updating packages, removing unused files and cache, cleaning logs, and more, with safety features like backups and optional aggressive modes.
